name: Stanley Mountain Vacuum Switchback 473ml
description: Sleek, insulated and designed to go along for the ride. It keeps your drink at the right temperature, is leak-proof and has a seal that permits one-handed sipping.Integrated cover keeps grit out of the drinking area.Large finger loop doubles as a hook for easy transport.Push-button seal mechanism allows for one-handed sipping.Leak-proof design lets you tote it with confidence.Lid disassembles for easy, thorough cleaning.Fits most cup holders provided in cars.
